displaytitle: The Sepulchre: Illustration for Virgil's Eighth Eclogue
medium: Pen and black ink, grey wash, with touches of white gouache
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed:
in graphite, on verso [in artist's hand]: Since 1st filling in grid - | Feb 17, 76 - Mord. 2 to 1 - 1 hour |  March 3 - -do. 2 to 1 - 1 hour | Mar: 27 - 3 to 1 - 1 hour | Mar 31 - 4 to 1 - 1 hour
in graphite, on verso upper right: Allen Hook's vehicle for Watercolours DEXTRINE or roasted starch 23 St. Paul's ch yard | Gillett's Gillot's steel pens--engraving pen 389
in graphite, on verso lower left: 8th Ecl--While the troubled mourn...
